select
from chukushenqing where shenqingren = #{shenqingren,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 0,1

select count(*) from chukushenqing where 1=1 and bianhao like concat('%',#{bianhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and shebeimingcheng like concat('%',#{shebeimingcheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and shenqingshuliang >= concat('',#{shenqingshuliang1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'') and shenqingshuliang <= concat('',#{shenqingshuliang2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'') and shenqingyuanyin like concat('%',#{shenqingyuanyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and shenqingren like concat('%',#{shenqingren,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and issh like concat('%',#{issh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')

select from chukushenqing where 1=1
and shenqingren =#{shenqingren}

select from chukushenqing where 1=1 and bianhao like concat('%',#{bianhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and shebeimingcheng like concat('%',#{shebeimingcheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and shenqingshuliang >= concat('',#{shenqingshuliang1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'') and shenqingshuliang <= concat('',#{shenqingshuliang2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'') and shenqingyuanyin like concat('%',#{shenqingyuanyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and shenqingren like concat('%',#{shenqingren,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and issh like concat('%',#{issh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') order by id desc
limit #{pageno},#{pageSize}

insert into chukushenqing
id,
bianhao, shebeimingcheng, shenqingshuliang, shenqingyuanyin, shenqingren,

#{addtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update chukushenqing
bianhao = #{bianhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shebeimingcheng = #{shebeimingcheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shenqingshuliang = #{shenqingshuliang,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shenqingyuanyin = #{shenqingyuanyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shenqingren = #{shenqingren,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
addtime = #{addtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
